sentences.sContent: In marriage, a man promises to cherish his wife.
sentences.sCn: 在婚姻中，男人承诺要爱护妻子。

sentences.sContent: ...and I will cherish the goodwill you showed to me wherever I go...
...It is really an honor for me to be your friend and I will cherish the goodwill you have showed to me wherever I go...
...It is really an honor for me to be your sister and I will cherish the goodwill you showed to me wherever I go...
...I will cherish the good will and family affection you showed me...

remMethod.val: 生命易逝(perish)， 应当珍惜(cherish)

trans.tranOther: to love someone or something very much and take care of them well
